article_summary:
They’re filing a class-action lawsuit against the city of Pagedale, saying its municipal system of fines is a civil rights violation.
Head over to Pagedale, Missouri, a small suburb of St. Louis that is 90 percent black and see the town’s money-grubbing ways.
The rapaciousness of the governments of small communities in the St. Louis area started receiving massive attention following the police shooting of Michael Brown in Ferguson.
Municipal code enforcement is a scourge.
According to research by the St. Louis Post-Dispatch, the city has handed out more than 2,000 code citations in the past year, enough to give nearly two tickets to every single household in the city of 3,300.
